snippet.title: Johnny Depp and Amber Heard's wild wedding made her feel 'lonelier than ever'
snippet.description: Six years ago today,  and Amber Heard exchanged vows in stunning wedding on his private island in the Bahamas, marrying on the beach of Little H's Pond Cay.   The bride wore a flowing long white gown with long sleeves and a dramatic white veil, while Johnny opted for a white tuxedo jacket with black trousers and white shoes.  And according to friends at the time, the day was blissfully romantic.  "Johnny's private island is a tropical paradise. Wedding guests were treated to an amazing weekend that ended with a romantic beach ceremony,' a source told People magazine.   "Guests relaxed on the beaches, had fun snorkeling and enjoyed food cooked by private chefs. Everyone seemed to have the best time. It was a very celebratory vibe."  Gushing about the idyllic surroundings, the insider continued: "The weather was perfect and the beach setting was gorgeous. The ceremony was beach casual and intimate, yet very romantic."  According to reports at the time, the shindig on the 45-acre palm- ...
